entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Allow opt-out of automatic disposal in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #109492
  • Problems with freezing when running Process #109489

Closed

  • ValidateDataAnnotations doesn't work for nullable types #109483
  • Why I can inject Scoped service into BackgroundService if not in development environment? #109490
  • Comparer interface restrition problem #109487
  • GitHub bot has started pinging owners when the area of a closed issue changes. #109058
    10.0.0
  • Tag 9.0.0-preview.6.24327.7 is missing the `v` prefix #109158
  • (De)Serialization of list of objects containing polymorphic generics in C# .Net8 with System.Text.Json #109307

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ifdef for RawArrayData in NativeAOT Runtime.Base #109494
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update dynamic methods reference #109473
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Do not apply the user mention automation for closed issues/prs #109485
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Fix condition in PAL's SetThreadDescription #109470
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `STJ.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range)` #109472
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Defer compilation in bblocks with unitialized stack #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Fix BCE regression #109466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simple importer single-block forward substitution #109482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mitigate first-class Span breaks #108789
    area-codeflow
  • Moved inlinearray_value to infrequent_data structure in MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Improve containment for widening intrinsics #109474
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
